comments.body:
I don't understand this method. Why is it an instance method? It doesn't seem to be in any way dependent on the object it's called on? Or am I missing something?

Same with the other methods that call _create*

I agree that the organization of the ScrollBehavior classes could be cleaned up. It would definitely be simpler to just have a global createSnapScrollSimulation method (perhaps in scrollable.dart, where it's used). 
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/844
